column5: Well finally got my first bow tody! I was so happy! Ive been going to the same spot for a week straight!! Ive been getting some under 12", but finally something decent!  Well heres some pics.. Already ate 1/2 a filet! Done on the BBQ.. soooo tasty lol.. Ive been craving it for months!!  Species - Rainbow Trout Sex - Male Weight - 4lbs 8oz Length - 24 1/4" Location - Grafton Creek @ Lakeshore Rd Lure - Mepps Black Fury #2 Weather - Overcast & Breezy - 7pm - Following Morning Rain
Tasted amazing, used EVOO, Sea Salt, Pepper, and a Garlic Seasoning..  Now I gotta get a few more and pack some in the freezer!!
Great report and pics Miller P The Mepps Black Furry is really a hot lure for specks and bows!!! Congratulations on this beauty Thanks for sharing Leechman
Thanks, yeah and when the water was so clear like yesterday, I switched up and went to a Mepps Comet # 2 Gold/Char and landed 2 - 18" Bows.
